scripts.dev:server: powershell -NoProfile -Command "cd server/Login; if (Test-Path venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1) { . .\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1 }; $env:FLASK_APP='app.py'; flask run --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5000"
scripts.dev:all: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoProfile','-Command','npm run dev:server'; npm run dev:client"
